name: the box (itch) (RikematDev)
description:
This is an experimental game about a box that has always been closed, and has the desire of knowing what's inside it.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to movement.

Moving with the mouse cause bugs.

"the box" was made in one day as a submission to A Secter (Bitsy Jam).

facebook.com/rikematdev/ - rikematdev.tumblr.com/
